trans-unit.source: $y needs to be converted into an object that $x can deal with. This is done by first checking if $y is something that $x might be upgraded to. If that is the case, no further attempts are made. The next is to see if $y supports the method as_float(). The method as_float() is expected to return either an object that has the same class as $x, a subclass thereof, or a string that ref($x)->new() can parse to create an object.
trans-unit.target: $ y需要转换为$ x可以处理的对象。首先检查$ y是否是$ x可能升级到的东西。在这种情况下，将不再进行任何尝试。接下来是查看$ y是否支持方法 as_float() 。方法 as_float() 期望返回与$ x具有相同类的对象，其子类或 ref($x)->new() 可以解析以创建对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: $y needs to be converted into an object that $x can deal with. This is done by first checking if $y is something that $x might be upgraded to. If that is the case, no further attempts are made. The next is to see if $y supports the method as_int(). If it does, as_int() is called, but if it doesn't, the next thing is to see if $y supports the method as_number(). If it does, as_number() is called. The method as_int() (and as_number()) is expected to return either an object that has the same class as $x, a subclass thereof, or a string that ref($x)->new() can parse to create an object.
trans-unit.target: $ y需要转换为$ x可以处理的对象。首先检查$ y是否是$ x可能升级到的东西。在这种情况下，将不再进行任何尝试。接下来是查看$ y是否支持方法 as_int() 。如果是，则调用 as_int() ，但如果不这样做，则下一步是查看$ y是否支持方法 as_number() 。如果是这样，则调用 as_number() 。方法 as_int() （和 as_number() ）将返回与$ x具有相同类的对象，其子类或 ref($x)->new() 可以解析以创建一个字符串的字符串。目的。

(1 or 0 I suppose). This behavior may change in the future, so don't write code that relies on it. Present_In is a Perl extension that is expressible in a bipartite or compound form (for example, \p{Present_In=4.0} ), so charprop accepts it. But Any is a Perl extension that isn't expressible that way, so charprop returns undef for it. Also charprop returns undef for all Perl extensions that are internal-only.
trans-unit.target: （我想是1或0）。这种行为将来可能会改变，因此请不要编写依赖它的代码。 Present_In 是一个Perl扩展，可以用二分或复合形式表示（例如 \p{Present_In=4.0} ），因此 charprop 接受它。但是 Any 是无法用这种方式表示的Perl扩展，因此 charprop 为此返回 undef 。同时， charprop 对于仅内部使用的所有Perl扩展都返回 undef 。

(Actually, besides Common , the Inherited script, contains characters that are used in multiple scripts. These are modifier characters which inherit the script value of the controlling character. trans-unit.source: (D deprecated) Using literal non-graphic (including control) characters in the source to refer to the ^FOO variables, like $^X and ${^GLOBAL_PHASE} is now deprecated. (We use ^X and ^G here for legibility. They actually represent the non-printable control characters, code points 0x18 and 0x07, respectively; ^A would mean the control character whose code point is 0x01.) This only affects code like $\cT , where \cT is a control in the source code; ${"\cT"} and $^T remain valid. Things that are non-controls and also not graphic are NO-BREAK SPACE and SOFT HYPHEN, which were previously only allowed for historical reasons.
trans-unit.target: （不建议使用D）现在不建议使用源中的文字非图形（包括控制）字符来引用^ FOO变量，例如 $^X 和 ${^GLOBAL_PHASE} 。（为了清楚起见，我们在这里使用 ^X 和 ^G 它们实际上分别表示不可打印的控制字符，代码点分别为0x18和0x07； ^A 表示代码点为0x01的控制字符。）这仅影响 $\cT 代码\ cT，其中 \cT 是源代码中的控件； ${"\cT"} 和 $^T 保持有效。非控制性的，非图形性的是NO-BREAK SPACE和SOFT HYPHEN，它们以前仅出于历史原因才被允许。

trans-unit.source: (D deprecated, regexp) The \C character class is deprecated, and will become a compile-time error in a future release of perl (tentatively v5.24). This construct allows you to match a single byte of what makes up a multi-byte single UTF8 character, and breaks encapsulation. It is currently also very buggy. If you really need to process the individual bytes, you probably want to convert your string to one where each underlying byte is stored as a character, with utf8::encode().
trans-unit.target: （不推荐使用D，正则表达式）不推荐使用\ C字符类，它将在以后的perl版本（暂定为v5.24）中成为编译时错误。这种结构允许您匹配组成多字节单个UTF8字符的单个字节，并中断封装。当前它也很容易出错。如果确实需要处理各个字节，则可能需要使用utf8 :: encode（）将字符串转换为一个字符串，其中每个基础字节都作为字符存储。

trans-unit.source: (D deprecated, utf8) This message indicates a bug either in the Perl core or in XS code. Such code was trying to find out if a character, allegedly stored internally encoded as UTF-8, was of a given type, such as being punctuation or a digit. But the character was not encoded in legal UTF-8. The %s is replaced by a string that can be used by knowledgeable people to determine what the type being checked against was. If utf8 warnings are enabled, a further message is raised, giving details of the malformation.
trans-unit.target: （不推荐使用D，utf8）此消息表示Perl内核或XS代码中的错误。这种代码试图找出据称内部编码为UTF-8的字符是否属于给定类型，例如标点符号或数字。但是该字符未使用合法的UTF-8编码。该 %s 是可以由懂行的人用来确定被检查什么类型对是一个字符串替换。如果启用了 utf8 警告，则会引发另一条消息，其中提供了格式错误的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: (Every SVish thing has a magic queue, and magic is an entry in that queue. This is how a single variable may participate in multiple forms of magic simultaneously. For instance, environment variables regularly have two forms at once: their %ENV magic and their taint magic. However, the magic which implements overloading is applied to the stashes, which are rarely used directly, thus should not slow down Perl.)
trans-unit.target: （每个SVish事物都有一个魔术队列，魔术是该队列中的一个条目。这就是单个变量可以同时参与多种形式的魔术的方式。例如，环境变量通常同时具有两种形式：它们的％ENV magic和它们的异味魔术。但是，实现重载的魔术被应用到隐藏项，它们很少直接使用，因此不应减慢Perl的速度。）

trans-unit.source: (F) A "last" statement was executed to break out of the current block, except that there's this itty bitty problem called there isn't a current block. Note that an "if" or "else" block doesn't count as a "loopish" block, as doesn't a block given to sort(), map() or grep(). You can usually double the curlies to get the same effect though, because the inner curlies will be considered a block that loops once. See last.
trans-unit.target: （F）执行了“最后一个”语句以跳出当前块，但有一个小问题，即没有当前块。请注意，“ if”或“ else”块不算作“ loopish”块，也不分配给sort（），map（）或grep（）块。通常，您可以将冰壶加倍以获得相同的效果，因为内部冰壶将被视为一个循环一次的块。见最后。

trans-unit.source: (F) A "last" statement was executed to break out of the current block, except that there's this itty bitty problem called there isn't a current block. Note that an "if" or "else" block doesn't count as a "loopish" block, as doesn't a block given to sort(), map() or grep(). You can usually double the curlies to get the same effect though, because the inner curlies will be considered a block that loops once. See "last" in perlfunc.

trans-unit.source: (F) A Unicode string property is one which expands to a sequence of multiple characters. trans-unit.source: (F) A grapheme is what appears to a native-speaker of a language to be a character. For example, there can be a base character, like "R" and an accent, like a circumflex "^", that appear when displayed to be a single character with the circumflex hovering over the "R". Perl currently allows things like that circumflex to be delimiters of strings, patterns,

trans-unit.target: （F）通过调用exit从外部包通过call_sv（）调用的子例程。

trans-unit.source: (F) A subroutine using a signature fewer arguments than required by the signature. The caller of the subroutine is presumably at fault.
trans-unit.target: （F）使用签名的子例程的参数少于签名所需的参数。子例程的调用者可能有错误。

trans-unit.source: (F) A subroutine using a signature received fewer arguments than required by the signature. The caller of the subroutine is presumably at fault. Inconveniently, this error will be reported at the location of the subroutine, not that of the caller.

trans-unit.source: (F) A subroutine using a signature received more arguments than permitted by the signature. The caller of the subroutine is presumably at fault.

trans-unit.source: (F) A subroutine using a signature received more arguments than required by the signature. The caller of the subroutine is presumably at fault. Inconveniently, this error will be reported at the location of the subroutine, not that of the caller.

trans-unit.source: (F) A subroutine was not declared correctly. See perlsub.

trans-unit.source: (F) A tied array claimed to have a negative number of elements, which is not possible.
trans-unit.target: （F）绑定数组声称元素数为负，这是不可能的。

trans-unit.source: (F) A type cannot be forced to have both big-endian and little-endian byte-order at the same time, so this combination of modifiers is not allowed. See pack.

trans-unit.source: (F) A value used as either a hard reference or a symbolic reference must be a defined value. This helps to delurk some insidious errors.
trans-unit.target: （F）用作硬参考或符号参考的值必须是定义的值。这有助于消除一些隐患。

trans-unit.source: (F) A version number did not meet the "lax" criteria for versions. A "lax" version number is a positive decimal number (integer or decimal-fraction) without exponentiation or else a dotted-decimal v-string. If the v-string has fewer than three components, it must have a leading 'v' character. Otherwise, the leading 'v' is optional. Both decimal and dotted-decimal versions may have a trailing "alpha" component separated by an underscore character after a fractional or dotted-decimal component. The parenthesized text indicates which criteria were not met. See the version module for more details on allowed version formats.
trans-unit.target: （F）版本号不符合版本的“宽松”标准。 “ lax”版本号是不带指数的正十进制数字（整数或十进制小数），或者是点分十进制的v字符串。如果v字符串的分量少于三个，则它必须带有前导“ v”字符。否则，前导“ v”是可选的。十进制和点分十进制版本都可以在尾部的“ alpha”部分加上小数点或点分十进制部分后的下划线字符。括号内的文字表示不符合哪些条件。有关允许的版本格式的更多详细信息，请参见版本模块。

trans-unit.source: (F) A version number did not meet the "strict" criteria for versions. A "strict" version number is a positive decimal number (integer or decimal-fraction) without exponentiation or else a dotted-decimal v-string with a leading 'v' character and at least three components. The parenthesized text indicates which criteria were not met. See the version module for more details on allowed version formats.
trans-unit.target: （F）版本号不符合版本的“严格”标准。“严格”版本号是不带幂的十进制正数（整数或十进制小数），或者是点分十进制的v字符串，带有前导“ v”字符和至少三个组成部分。括号内的文字表示不符合哪些条件。有关允许的版本格式的更多详细信息，请参见版本模块。

trans-unit.source: (F) An attempt was made to perform an overloaded operation for which no handler was defined. trans-unit.source: (F) An error peculiar to VMS. Because Perl may have to deal with file specifications in either VMS or Unix syntax, it converts them to a single form when it must operate on them directly. Either you've passed an invalid file specification to Perl, or you've found a case the conversion routines don't handle. Drat.
trans-unit.target: （F）VMS特有的错误。由于Perl可能必须使用VMS或Unix语法处理文件规范，因此当必须直接对其进行操作时，它将Perl转换为单个格式。您已经向Perl传递了无效的文件规范，或者发现了转换例程无法处理的情况。德拉特

trans-unit.source: (F) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl does its own command line redirection, and couldn't open the file specified after '>' or '>>' on the command line for writing.
trans-unit.target: （F）VMS特有的错误。Perl进行自己的命令行重定向，无法打开在命令行上“>”或“ >>”之后指定的文件进行写入。

trans-unit.source: (F) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl does its own command line redirection, and couldn't open the file specified after '<' on the command line for reading.

trans-unit.source: (F) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl does its own command line redirection, and couldn't open the file specified after '2>' or '2>>' on the command line for writing.
trans-unit.target: （F）VMS特有的错误。Perl会执行自己的命令行重定向，并且无法打开命令行中'2>'或'2 >>'之后指定的文件进行写入。

trans-unit.source: (F) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl does its own command line redirection, and found that STDIN was a pipe, and that you also tried to redirect STDIN using '<'. Only one STDIN stream to a customer, please.
trans-unit.target: （F）VMS特有的错误。Perl进行了自己的命令行重定向，发现STDIN是管道，并且您还尝试使用'<'重定向STDIN。请只向客户发送一个STDIN流。

trans-unit.source: (F) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl does its own command line redirection, and thinks you tried to redirect stdout both to a file and into a pipe to another command. trans-unit.source: (F) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl handles its own command line redirection, and found a '>' or a '>>' on the command line, but can't find the name of the file to which to write data destined for stdout.
trans-unit.target: （F）VMS特有的错误。Perl处理自己的命令行重定向，并在命令行上找到了'>'或'>>'，但是找不到要向其写入stdout的数据的文件名。

trans-unit.source: (F) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl handles its own command line redirection, and found a '<' on the command line, but can't find the name of the file from which to read data for stdin.

trans-unit.source: (F) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl handles its own command line redirection, and found a '2>' or a '2>>' on the command line, but can't find the name of the file to which to write data destined for stderr.

trans-unit.source: (F) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl handles its own command line redirection, and found a '|' at the end of the command line, so it doesn't know where you want to pipe the output from this command.

trans-unit.source: (F) An experimental feature added in Perl 5.14 allowed each, keys, push, pop, shift, splice, unshift, and values to be called with a scalar argument. This experiment is considered unsuccessful, and has been removed. The postderef feature may meet your needs better.
trans-unit.target: （F）在Perl 5.14加入的实验特征允许 each ， keys ， push ， pop ， shift ， splice ， unshift ，和 values 与标量参数来调用。该实验被认为不成功，已被删除。该 postderef 功能可满足您的需求更好。

trans-unit.source: (F) An extension is attempting to insert text into the current parse (using lex_stuff_pvn or similar), but tried to insert a character that couldn't be part of the current input. This is an inherent pitfall of the stuffing mechanism, and one of the reasons to avoid it. Where it is necessary to stuff, stuffing only plain ASCII is recommended.
trans-unit.target: （F）扩展程序正在尝试将文本插入当前的解析中（使用lex_stuff_pvn或类似方法），但是试图插入不能作为当前输入一部分的字符。这是填充机制的固有陷阱，也是避免填充机制的原因之一。在需要填充的地方，建议仅填充纯ASCII。

trans-unit.source: (F) An extension using the keyword plugin mechanism violated the plugin API.
trans-unit.target: （F）使用关键字插件机制的扩展违反了插件API。

trans-unit.source: (F) An ioctl() or fcntl() returned more than Perl was bargaining for. Perl guesses a reasonable buffer size, but puts a sentinel byte at the end of the buffer just in case. This sentinel byte got clobbered, and Perl assumes that memory is now corrupted. See ioctl.
trans-unit.target: （F）一个ioctl（）或fcntl（）返回的收益超过Perl的讨价还价。Perl猜测缓冲区大小合理，但为防万一，在缓冲区的末尾放置一个前哨字节。这个前哨字节被破坏了，Perl认为现在内存已损坏。参见ioctl。

trans-unit.source: (F) An ioctl() or fcntl() returned more than Perl was bargaining for. Perl guesses a reasonable buffer size, but puts a sentinel byte at the end of the buffer just in case. This sentinel byte got clobbered, and Perl assumes that memory is now corrupted. See "ioctl" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）一个ioctl（）或fcntl（）返回的收益超过Perl讨价还价的水平。Perl猜测缓冲区大小是合理的，但是为了防万一，在缓冲区的末尾放置一个前哨字节。这个前哨字节被破坏了，Perl认为现在的内存已损坏。请参阅perlfunc中的“ ioctl”。

trans-unit.source: (F) An unknown command line option was given.
(F) An untrapped exception was raised while executing a BEGIN subroutine. Compilation stops immediately and the interpreter is exited.

trans-unit.source: (F) And you probably never will, because you probably don't have the sources to your kernel, and your vendor probably doesn't give a rip about what you want. There is a vulnerability anywhere that you have a set-id script, and to close it you need to remove the set-id bit from the script that you're attempting to run. To actually run the script set-id, your best bet is to put a set-id C wrapper around your script.
trans-unit.target: （F）而且您可能永远也不会，因为您可能没有内核的源代码，并且您的供应商可能也没有透露您想要的内容。拥有set-id脚本的任何地方都有一个漏洞，要关闭该漏洞，您需要从尝试运行的脚本中删除set-id位。要实际运行脚本set-id，最好的选择是在脚本周围放置一个set-id C包装器。

trans-unit.source: (F) And you probably never will, because you probably don't have the sources to your kernel, and your vendor probably doesn't give a rip about what you want. Your best bet is to put a setuid C wrapper around your script.
trans-unit.target: （F）而且您可能永远也不会这样做，因为您可能没有内核的源代码，并且您的供应商可能也没有透露您想要的内容。最好的选择是在脚本中放置一个setuid C包装器。

trans-unit.source: (F) Apparently you've been programming in csh too much. Variables are always mentioned with the $ in Perl, unlike in the shells, where it can vary from one line to the next.
trans-unit.target: （F）显然您在csh中进行了太多编程。在Perl中，变量总是用$提及，与shell中的变量不同，shell可能在一行之间变化。

trans-unit.source: (F) As an accidental feature, AUTOLOAD subroutines were looked up as methods (using the @ISA hierarchy), even when the subroutines to be autoloaded were called as plain functions (e.g. Foo::bar()), not as methods (e.g. Foo->bar() or $obj->bar()).
trans-unit.target: （F）作为偶然的功能，即使将要自动加载的子例程称为简单函数（例如 Foo::bar() ），而不是方法（例如，），将 AUTOLOAD 子例程也视为方法（使用 @ISA 层次结构） Foo->bar() 或 $obj->bar() ）。

trans-unit.source: (F) Assigning to \(%hash) is not supported. If you meant to make %hash refer to some other hash, use \%hash = \%other_hash . If you want to make the elements of %hash into aliases of the scalars referenced on the right-hand side, use a hash slice: \@hash{@keys} = @those_scalar_refs .
trans-unit.target: [F）不支持分配给 \(%hash) 。如果要让％hash引用其他哈希，请使用 \%hash = \%other_hash 。如果要将％hash的元素设置为右侧引用的标量的别名，请使用哈希片： \@hash{@keys} = @those_scalar_refs 。

trans-unit.source: (F) Assigning to \(%hash) is not supported. If you meant to make %hash refer to some other hash, use \%hash = \%other_hash. If you want to make the elements of %hash into aliases of the scalars referenced on the right-hand side, use a hash slice: \@hash{@keys} = @those_scalar_refs.

trans-unit.source: (F) Assigning to \local(@array) or \(local @array) is not supported, as it is not clear exactly what it should do. If you meant to make @array refer to some other array, use \@array = \@other_array . If you want to make the elements of @array aliases of the scalars referenced on the right-hand side, use \(@array) = @scalar_refs .
trans-unit.target: （F）不支持分配给 \local(@array) 或 \(local @array) ，因为尚不清楚应执行的操作。如果要让@array引用其他数组，请使用 \@array = \@other_array 。如果要在右侧引用标量的@array别名元素，请使用 \(@array) = @scalar_refs 。

trans-unit.source: (F) Assigning to \local(@array) or \(local @array) is not supported, as it is not clear exactly what it should do. If you meant to make @array refer to some other array, use \@array = \@other_array. trans-unit.source: (F) Certain operations are deemed to be too insecure for a setuid or setgid script to even be allowed to attempt. Generally speaking there will be another way to do what you want that is, if not secure, at least securable. See perlsec.

trans-unit.source: (F) Closing an output file from in-place editing, as with the -i command-line switch, failed.

trans-unit.source: (F) Configure couldn't find the crypt() function on your machine, probably because your vendor didn't supply it, probably because they think the U.S. Government thinks it's a secret, or at least that they will continue to pretend that it is. And if you quote me on that, I will deny it.
trans-unit.target: （F）Configure在您的计算机上找不到crypt（）函数，可能是因为您的供应商未提供该函数，可能是因为他们认为美国政府认为这是秘密，或者至少他们会继续假装该函数。是。如果您引用我的话，我会否认。

trans-unit.target: （F）不支持在 s/// 运算符内创建新线程。

trans-unit.source: (F) Currently the implementation of "state" only permits the initialization of scalar variables in scalar context. Re-write state ($a) = 42 as state $a = 42 to change from list to scalar context. Constructions such as state (@a) = foo() will be supported in a future perl release.
trans-unit.target: （F）当前，“状态”的实现仅允许在标量上下文中初始化标量变量。将 state ($a) = 42 重写为 state $a = 42 以从列表更改为标量上下文。将来的perl版本中将支持诸如 state (@a) = foo() 构造。

trans-unit.target: （F）对于普通实数，您不能取负数或零的对数。不过，如果您真的想对负数执行此操作，则Perl附带有Math :: Complex软件包。

trans-unit.source: (F) Fully qualified subroutine and variable names are not allowed in "our" declarations, because that doesn't make much sense under existing rules. Such syntax is reserved for future extensions.
trans-unit.target: （F）在“我们的”声明中不允许使用完全限定的子例程和变量名，因为在现有规则下这没有多大意义。此类语法保留用于将来的扩展。

trans-unit.source: (F) Group names must follow the rules for perl identifiers, meaning they must start with a non-digit word character. A common cause of this error is using (?&0) instead of (?0). See perlre.
trans-unit.target: （F）组名必须遵循perl标识符的规则，这意味着它们必须以非数字字字符开头。导致此错误的常见原因是使用（？＆0）而不是（？0）。参见perlre。

trans-unit.source: (F) If a closure has attributes, the subroutine passed to an attribute handler is the prototype that is cloned when a new closure is created. This subroutine cannot be called.
trans-unit.target: （F）如果闭包具有属性，则传递给属性处理程序的子例程是在创建新闭包时克隆的原型。此子例程无法调用。

trans-unit.source: (F) If you assign to a conditional operator, the 2nd and 3rd arguments must either both be scalars or both be lists. Otherwise Perl won't know which context to supply to the right side.
trans-unit.target: （F）如果您分配给条件运算符，则第二个和第三个参数必须都是标量或都必须是列表。否则，Perl将不知道要在右侧提供哪个上下文。

trans-unit.source: (F) In require Bare::Word, the bareword is not allowed to start with a double-colon. Write require ::Foo::Bar as require Foo::Bar instead.
trans-unit.target: （F）在 require Bare::Word ，裸词不允许以双冒号开头。将 require ::Foo::Bar 编写为 require Foo::Bar 。

trans-unit.source: (F) In a here document construct like <<FOO, the label FOO is too long for Perl to handle. You have to be seriously twisted to write code that triggers this error.
trans-unit.target: （F）在类似 <<FOO 的此处文档结构中，标签 FOO 对于Perl来说太长了。您必须非常扭曲才能编写触发此错误的代码。

trans-unit.source: (F) In a subroutine signature definition, a comment following a sigil ($, @ or %), needs to be separated by whitespace or a comma etc., in particular to avoid confusion with the $# variable. For example:
trans-unit.target: （F）在子例程签名定义中，标记后的注释（ $ ， @ 或 % ）需要用空格或逗号等分隔，特别是避免与 $# 变量混淆。例如：

trans-unit.source: (F) In a subroutine signature, you put something after a slurpy (array or hash) parameter. The slurpy parameter takes all the available arguments, so there can't be any left to fill later parameters.
trans-unit.target: （F）在子例程签名中，将某些东西放在一个稀疏的（数组或哈希）参数之后。slurpy参数采用所有可用的参数，因此没有剩余空间可填充以后的参数。

trans-unit.source: (F) In a subroutine signature, you wrote something like "$a = undef, $b", making an earlier parameter optional and a later one mandatory. Parameters are filled from left to right, so it's impossible for the caller to omit an earlier one and pass a later one. If you want to act as if the parameters are filled from right to left, declare the rightmost optional and then shuffle the parameters around in the subroutine's body.
trans-unit.target: （F）在子例程签名中，您编写了类似“ $ a = undef，$ b”的内容，使较早的参数为可选，而后一个参数为必需。参数是从左到右填充的，因此调用者无法省略较早的参数并传递较晚的参数。如果要像从右到左填充参数一样操作，请声明最右边的可选参数，然后在子例程的主体中随机排列参数。

trans-unit.source: (F) In a subroutine signature, you wrote something like "$a =", making a named optional parameter without a default value. A nameless optional parameter is permitted to have no default value, but a named one must have a specific default. You probably want "$a = undef".
trans-unit.target: （F）在子例程签名中，您编写了类似“ $ a =“之类的内容，使命名的可选参数没有默认值。无名称的可选参数允许没有默认值，但是命名的参数必须具有特定的默认值。您可能需要“ $ a = undef”。

trans-unit.source: (F) It makes no sense to test the current stat buffer for symbolic linkhood if the last stat that wrote to the stat buffer already went past the symlink to get to the real file. Use an actual filename instead.
trans-unit.target: （F）如果写入统计缓冲区的最后一个统计已经超过符号链接以到达实际文件，则测试当前统计缓冲区的符号链接没有意义。请改用实际的文件名。

trans-unit.source: (F) Lexically scoped subroutines are not yet implemented. Don't try that yet.
trans-unit.target: （F）词法范围子程序尚未实现。不要尝试。

trans-unit.source: (F) Lexically scoped subroutines aren't in a package, so it doesn't make sense to try to declare one with a package qualifier on the front.
trans-unit.target: （F）词法范围子例程不在包中，因此尝试声明前面带有包限定符的子例程没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: (F) Lexically scoped variables aren't in a package, so it doesn't make sense to try to declare one with a package qualifier on the front. Use local() if you want to localize a package variable.
trans-unit.target: （F）词法范围变量不在包中，因此尝试在前面带有包限定符的变量声明是没有意义的。如果要本地化包变量，请使用local（）。

trans-unit.source: (F) List assignment to %ENV is not supported on some systems, notably VMS.

trans-unit.source: (F) Lookbehind is allowed only for subexpressions whose length is fixed and known at compile time. For positive lookbehind, you can use the \K regex construct as a way to get the equivalent functionality. See (?<=pattern) \K in perlre.
trans-unit.target: （F）后向仅允许长度固定且在编译时已知的子表达式。为了让您拥有积极的眼光，您可以使用 \K regex构造作为获取等效功能的一种方法。请参阅（？<= pattern）\ K in perlre。

trans-unit.source: (F) Named Unicode character escapes (\N{...} ) may return a multi-character sequence. Even though a character class is supposed to match just one character of input, perl will match the whole thing correctly, except when the class is inverted ([^...]), or the escape is the beginning or final end point of a range. The mathematically logical behavior for what matches when inverting is very different from what people expect, so we have decided to forbid it. Similarly unclear is what should be generated when the \N{...} is used as one of the end points of the range, such as in
trans-unit.target: （F）命名的Unicode字符转义符（ \N{...} ）可能返回一个多字符序列。即使一个字符类只匹配输入的一个字符，但perl仍将正确地匹配整个内容，除非该类被倒置（ [^...] ）或转义是a的开始或结束点范围。反相时匹配的数学逻辑行为与人们期望的完全不同，因此我们决定禁止这样做。同样，不清楚将 \N{...} 用作范围的端点之一时应生成什么，例如

trans-unit.source: (F) On some platforms, notably Windows, the three-or-more-arguments form of open does not support pipes, such as open($pipe, '|-', @args) . Use the two-argument open($pipe, '|prog arg1 arg2...') form instead.
trans-unit.target: （F）在某些平台上，尤其是Windows，三个或三个以上参数形式的 open 不支持管道，例如 open($pipe, '|-', @args) 。使用双参数 open($pipe, '|prog arg1 arg2...') 的形式来代替。

trans-unit.source: (F) On some platforms, notably Windows, the three-or-more-arguments form of open does not support pipes, such as open($pipe, '|-', @args). Use the two-argument open($pipe, '|prog arg1 arg2...') form instead.
trans-unit.target: （F）在某些平台上（尤其是Windows）， open 的三个或更多个参数形式不支持管道，例如 open($pipe, '|-', @args) 。请改用两个参数的 open($pipe, '|prog arg1 arg2...') 形式。

trans-unit.source: (F) One (or both) of the numeric arguments to the range operator ".." are outside the range which can be represented by integers internally. One possible workaround is to force Perl to use magical string increment by prepending "0" to your numbers.
trans-unit.target: （F）范围运算符“ ..”的一个或两个数字参数超出了可以用内部整数表示的范围。一种可能的解决方法是通过在数字前加“ 0”来强制Perl使用魔术字符串增量。

trans-unit.source: (F) Only a bare module name is allowed as the first argument to a "use".

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl aborted due to too high a number of signals pending. This usually indicates that your operating system tried to deliver signals too fast (with a very high priority), starving the perl process from resources it would need to reach a point where it can process signals safely. (See "Deferred Signals (Safe Signals)" in perlipc.)
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl因待处理的信号数量过多而中止。这通常表明您的操作系统尝试过快地传送信号（具有很高的优先级），使perl进程无法使用所需的资源，从而无法安全地处理信号。（请参阅perlipc中的“延迟信号（安全信号）”。）

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl aborted due to too high a number of signals pending. This usually indicates that your operating system tried to deliver signals too fast (with a very high priority), starving the perl process from resources it would need to reach a point where it can process signals safely. (See Deferred Signals (Safe Signals) in perlipc.)
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl因待处理的信号数量过多而中止。这通常表明您的操作系统尝试过快地传送信号（具有很高的优先级），使perl进程无法使用所需的资源，从而无法安全处理信号。（请参阅perlipc中的延迟信号（安全信号）。）

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl can't peek at the stdio buffer of filehandles when it doesn't know about your kind of stdio. You'll have to use a filename instead.
trans-unit.target: （F）当Perl不了解您的stdio类型时，它无法窥视文件句柄的stdio缓冲区。您必须改用文件名。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl could not compile a file specified in a require statement. Perl uses this generic message when none of the errors that it encountered were severe enough to halt compilation immediately.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl无法编译 require 语句中指定的文件。当遇到的任何错误都严重到无法立即停止编译时，Perl就会使用此通用消息。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl could not compile a file specified in a require statement. Perl uses this generic message when none of the errors that it encountered were severe enough to halt compilation immediately.

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl could not figure out what you meant inside this construct; this notifies you that it is giving up trying.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl无法弄清楚您在此构造中的含义；这会通知您它正在放弃尝试。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl detected an attempt to return illegal lvalues (such as temporary or readonly values) from a subroutine used as an lvalue. This is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl检测到尝试从用作左值的子例程返回非法左值（例如临时值或只读值）的尝试。这是不允许的。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl detected tainted data when trying to compile a regular expression that contains a call to a user-defined character property function, i.e. \p{IsFoo} or \p{InFoo} . See User-Defined Character Properties in perlunicode and perlsec.
trans-unit.target: （F）当试图编译包含调用用户定义的字符属性函数（即 \p{IsFoo} 或 \p{InFoo} 的正则表达式时，Perl检测到污染数据。请参见perlunicode和perlsec中的用户定义的字符属性。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl detected tainted data when trying to compile a regular expression that contains a call to a user-defined character property function, i.e. \p{IsFoo} or \p{InFoo}. See "User-Defined Character Properties" in perlunicode and perlsec.
trans-unit.target: （F）当试图编译包含调用用户定义的字符属性函数（即 \p{IsFoo} 或 \p{InFoo} 的正则表达式时，Perl检测到污染数据。请参见perlunicode和perlsec中的“用户定义的字符属性”。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl detected tainted data when trying to compile a regular expression that contains the (?{ ... }) zero-width assertion, which is unsafe. See "(?{ code })" in perlre, and perlsec.
trans-unit.target: （F）当试图编译包含 (?{ ... }) 零宽度断言的正则表达式时，Perl检测到污染数据，这是不安全的。请参见perlre和perlsec中的“（？{code}）”。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl detected tainted data when trying to compile a regular expression that contains the (?{ ... }) zero-width assertion, which is unsafe. See (?{ code }) in perlre, and perlsec.
trans-unit.target: （F）当试图编译包含 (?{ ... }) 零宽度断言的正则表达式时，Perl检测到污染数据，这是不安全的。请参见perlre和perlsec中的（？{code}）。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl found a BEGIN {} subroutine (or a use directive, which implies a BEGIN {} ) after one or more compilation errors had already occurred. Since the intended environment for the BEGIN {} could not be guaranteed (due to the errors), and since subsequent code likely depends on its correct operation, Perl just gave up.
trans-unit.target: （F）在一个或多个编译错误已发生之后，Perl找到了 BEGIN {} 子例程（或一个 use 指令，这意味着 BEGIN {} ）。由于无法保证 BEGIN {} 的预期环境（由于错误），并且由于后续代码可能取决于其正确的操作，因此Perl放弃了。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl found a BEGIN {} subroutine (or a use directive, which implies a BEGIN {}) after one or more compilation errors had already occurred. Since the intended environment for the BEGIN {} could not be guaranteed (due to the errors), and since subsequent code likely depends on its correct operation, Perl just gave up.
trans-unit.target: （F）在一个或多个编译错误已发生之后，Perl找到了 BEGIN {} 子例程（或一个 use 指令，这意味着 BEGIN {} ）。由于无法保证 BEGIN {} 的预期环境（由于错误），并且由于后续代码可能取决于其正确的操作，因此Perl放弃了。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl limits identifiers (names for variables, functions, etc.) to about 250 characters for simple names, and somewhat more for compound names (like $A::B ). You've exceeded Perl's limits. Future versions of Perl are likely to eliminate these arbitrary limitations.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl将标识符（变量，函数等的名称）的简单名称限制为大约250个字符，而对于复合名称（例如 $A::B ）则限制更多。您已经超出了Perl的限制。Perl的未来版本可能会消除这些任意限制。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl limits identifiers (names for variables, functions, etc.) to about 250 characters for simple names, and somewhat more for compound names (like $A::B). You've exceeded Perl's limits. Future versions of Perl are likely to eliminate these arbitrary limitations.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl将标识符（变量，函数等的名称）的简单名称限制为大约250个字符，而对于复合名称（例如 $A::B ）则限制更多。您已经超出了Perl的限制。Perl的未来版本可能会消除这些任意限制。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl limits the representation of decimal numbers in programs to about 250 characters. You've exceeded that length. Future versions of Perl are likely to eliminate this arbitrary limitation. In the meantime, try using scientific notation (e.g. "1e6" instead of "1_000_000").
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl将程序中的十进制数表示形式限制为大约250个字符。您已超过该长度。Perl的未来版本可能会消除此任意限制。同时，尝试使用科学计数法（例如，用“ 1e6”代替“ 1_000_000”）。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl normally treats carriage returns in the program text as it would any other whitespace, which means you should never see this error when Perl was built using standard options. For some reason, your version of Perl appears to have been built without this support. Talk to your Perl administrator.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl通常将程序文本中的回车与其他空格一样对待，这意味着使用标准选项构建Perl时，您永远都不会看到此错误。由于某种原因，您的Perl版本似乎是在没有此支持的情况下构建的。与您的Perl管理员联系。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl strings can stretch over multiple lines. This message means that the closing delimiter was omitted. Because bracketed quotes count nesting levels, the following is missing its final parenthesis:
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl字符串可以跨越多行。此消息表示省略了结束定界符。由于带括号的引号计算嵌套级别，因此以下内容缺少其最后的括号：

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl supports a maximum of only 14 args to syscall().
(F) Perl thought it was reading UTF-16 encoded character data but while doing it Perl met a malformed Unicode surrogate.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl认为它正在读取UTF-16编码的字符数据，但这样做时Perl遇到了格式错误的Unicode替代。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl tried to calculate the method resolution order (MRO) of a package, but failed because the package stash has no name.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl尝试计算程序包的方法解析顺序（MRO），但失败了，因为程序包存储区没有名称。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl tried to compile a regular expression containing the (?{ ... }) zero-width assertion at run time, as it would when the pattern contains interpolated values. Since that is a security risk, it is not allowed. If you insist, you may still do this by using the re 'eval' pragma or by explicitly building the pattern from an interpolated string at run time and using that in an eval(). See "(?{ code })" in perlre.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl尝试在运行时编译包含 (?{ ... }) 零宽度断言的正则表达式，就像模式包含内插值时那样。由于存在安全隐患，因此不允许这样做。如果您坚持认为，仍可以通过使用 re 'eval' 编译指示或通过在运行时根据插值字符串显式构建模式并将其用于eval（）来执行此操作。请参见perlre中的“（？{code}）”。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl tried to compile a regular expression containing the (?{ ... }) zero-width assertion at run time, as it would when the pattern contains interpolated values. Since that is a security risk, it is not allowed. If you insist, you may still do this by using the re 'eval' pragma or by explicitly building the pattern from an interpolated string at run time and using that in an eval(). See (?{ code }) in perlre.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl试图在运行时编译一个包含 (?{ ... }) 零宽度断言的正则表达式，就像模式包含内插值时一样。由于存在安全隐患，因此不允许这样做。如果您坚持认为，仍可以通过使用 re 'eval' 编译指示或通过在运行时根据插值字符串显式构建模式并将其用于eval（）来执行此操作。请参见perlre中的（？{code}）。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl was looking for a number but found nothing that looked like a number. This happens, for example with \o{} , with no number between the braces.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl在寻找数字，但没有发现任何看起来像数字的东西。发生这种情况，例如使用 \o{} ，括号之间没有数字。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl was looking for a number but found nothing that looked like a number. This happens, for example with \o{}, with no number between the braces.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl在寻找数字，但没有发现任何看起来像数字的东西。例如，使用 \o{} 时会发生这种情况，大括号之间没有数字。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl was trying to evaluate a reference to a "typeglob" (that is, a symbol table entry that looks like *foo ), but found a reference to something else instead. You can use the ref() function to find out what kind of ref it really was. See perlref.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl试图评估对“ typeglob”的引用（即，符号表条目看起来像 *foo ），但是却找到了对其他内容的引用。您可以使用ref（）函数找出它实际上是哪种类型的ref。参见perlref。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl was trying to evaluate a reference to a "typeglob" (that is, a symbol table entry that looks like *foo), but found a reference to something else instead. You can use the ref() function to find out what kind of ref it really was. See perlref.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl试图评估对“ typeglob”的引用（即看起来像 *foo 的符号表条目），但是找到了对其他内容的引用。您可以使用ref（）函数找出它实际上是哪种类型的ref。参见perlref。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl was trying to evaluate a reference to a code value (that is, a subroutine), but found a reference to something else instead. You can use the ref() function to find out what kind of ref it really was. See also perlref.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl试图评估对代码值（即子程序）的引用，但找到了对其他内容的引用。您可以使用ref（）函数找出它实际上是哪种类型的ref。另请参见perlref。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl was trying to evaluate a reference to a hash value, but found a reference to something else instead. You can use the ref() function to find out what kind of ref it really was. See perlref.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl试图评估对哈希值的引用，但发现对其他内容的引用。您可以使用ref（）函数找出它实际上是哪种类型的ref。参见perlref。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl was trying to evaluate a reference to a scalar value, but found a reference to something else instead. You can use the ref() function to find out what kind of ref it really was. See perlref.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl试图评估对标量值的引用，但发现对其他内容的引用。您可以使用ref（）函数找出它实际上是哪种类型的ref。参见perlref。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl was trying to evaluate a reference to an array value, but found a reference to something else instead. You can use the ref() function to find out what kind of ref it really was. See perlref.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl试图评估对数组值的引用，但找到了对其他内容的引用。您可以使用ref（）函数找出它实际上是哪种类型的ref。参见perlref。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl was trying to execute the indicated program for you because that's what the #! line said. If that's not what you wanted, you may need to mention "perl" on the #! line somewhere.
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl试图为您执行指示的程序，因为这就是＃！行说。如果这不是您想要的，则可能需要在＃上提及“ perl”！在某处排队。

trans-unit.source: (F) Perl's -e and -E command-line options require an argument. If you want to run an empty program, pass the empty string as a separate argument or run a program consisting of a single 0 or 1:
trans-unit.target: （F）Perl的-e和-E命令行选项需要一个参数。如果要运行空程序，请将空字符串作为单独的参数传递，或运行由单个0或1组成的程序：

trans-unit.source: (F) Pod::PlainText was invoked via the compatibility mode pod2text() interface and the input file it was given could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: （F）Pod :: PlainText是通过兼容模式pod2text（）接口调用的，给出的输入文件无法打开。

trans-unit.source: (F) Pod::Text was invoked via the compatibility mode pod2text() interface and the input file it was given could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: （F）Pod :: Text是通过兼容模式pod2text（）接口调用的，给出的输入文件无法打开。

trans-unit.source: (F) Probably means you had a syntax error. Common reasons include:
trans-unit.target: （F）可能表示您语法错误。常见原因包括：

trans-unit.source: (F) Process identifiers must be (signed) integers. It is a fatal error to attempt to kill() an undefined, empty-string or otherwise non-numeric process identifier.
trans-unit.target: （F）进程标识符必须是（带符号的）整数。尝试终止未定义的空字符串或其他非数字进程标识符是致命的错误。

trans-unit.source: (F) Self-ties are of arrays and hashes are not supported in the current implementation.
trans-unit.target: （F）自关系是数组，在当前实现中不支持哈希。

trans-unit.source: (F) Some XS code tried to use sv_vcatpvfn() or a related function with a format string that specifies explicit indexes for some of the elements, and using a C-style variable-argument list (a va_list). This is not currently supported. XS authors wanting to do this must instead construct a C array of SV* scalars containing the arguments.
trans-unit.target: （F）一些XS代码试图使用 sv_vcatpvfn() 或相关函数，并使用格式字符串为某些元素指定显式索引，并使用C样式的变量参数列表（ va_list ）。当前不支持此功能。希望这样做的XS作者必须构造一个包含参数的 SV* 标量的C数组。

trans-unit.source: (F) Something has attempted to use an internal API call which depends on Perl being compiled with the default support for randomized hash key traversal, but this Perl has been compiled without it. You should report this warning to the relevant upstream party, or recompile perl with default options.
trans-unit.target: （F）有人尝试使用内部API调用，该内部API依赖于正在编译的Perl并具有对随机哈希键遍历的默认支持，但是此Perl已被编译而没有它。您应该将此警告报告给相关的上游用户，或者使用默认选项重新编译perl。

trans-unit.source: (F) Something other than a colon or whitespace was seen between the elements of an attribute list. If the previous attribute had a parenthesised parameter list, perhaps that list was terminated too soon. See attributes.
trans-unit.target: （F）在属性列表的元素之间看不到冒号或空格。如果先前的属性具有带括号的参数列表，则该列表可能终止得太早了。查看属性。

trans-unit.source: (F) Something went horribly bad in hexadecimal float handling.
trans-unit.target: （F）十六进制浮点运算中出现严重错误。

trans-unit.source: (F) Subroutines meant to be used in lvalue context should be declared as such. See "Lvalue subroutines" in perlsub.
trans-unit.target: （F）应该在左值上下文中使用的子例程应该这样声明。请参见perlsub中的“左值子例程”。

trans-unit.source: (F) Subroutines meant to be used in lvalue context should be declared as such. See Lvalue subroutines in perlsub.
trans-unit.target: （F）应该在左值上下文中使用的子例程应该这样声明。请参见perlsub中的Lvalue子例程。

trans-unit.source: (F) The "const" attribute causes an anonymous subroutine to be run and its value captured at the time that it is cloned. Named subroutines are not cloned like this, so the attribute does not make sense on them.
trans-unit.target: （F）“ const”属性使匿名子例程运行，并在克隆时捕获其值。命名子例程不会像这样被克隆，因此属性对它们没有意义。

trans-unit.source: (F) The "goto subroutine" call can't be used to jump out of an eval "string" or block.
trans-unit.target: （F）“ goto子例程”调用不能用于跳出eval的“字符串”或块。

trans-unit.source: (F) The "goto subroutine" call can't be used to jump out of the comparison sub for a sort(), or from a similar callback (such as the reduce() function in List::Util).
trans-unit.target: （F）“ goto子例程”调用不能用于跳出sort（）的比较子，或从类似的回调（例如List :: Util中的reduce（）函数）中跳出。

trans-unit.source: (F) The "no" keyword is recognized and executed at compile time, and returns no useful value. See perlmod.
trans-unit.target: （F）“ no”关键字在编译时被识别并执行，并且不返回任何有用的值。参见perlmod。

trans-unit.source: (F) The "use" keyword is recognized and executed at compile time, and returns no useful value. See perlmod.
trans-unit.target: （F）在编译时识别并执行“ use”关键字，并且不返回任何有用的值。参见perlmod。

trans-unit.source: (F) The #! line specifies a switch that doesn't make sense at this point. For example, it'd be kind of silly to put a -x on the #! line.
trans-unit.target: （F）＃！行指定了在这一点上没有意义的开关。例如，在＃上加上-x有点愚蠢！线。

trans-unit.source: (F) The -I command-line switch requires a directory name as part of the
trans-unit.target: （F）-I命令行开关需要目录名称作为

trans-unit.source: (F) The (* was followed by something that the regular expression compiler does not recognize. Check your spelling.
trans-unit.target: （F） (* 之后是正则表达式编译器无法识别的内容。请检查您的拼写。

trans-unit.source: (F) The (?[...]) extended character class regular expression construct only allows character classes (including character class escapes like \d ), operators, and parentheses. The one exception is (?flags:...) containing at least one flag and exactly one (?[...]) construct. This allows a regular expression containing just (?[...]) to be interpolated. If you see this error message, then you probably have some other (?...) construct inside your character class. See Extended Bracketed Character Classes in perlrecharclass.
trans-unit.target: （F） (?[...]) 扩展字符类正则表达式构造仅允许字符类（包括字符类转义符，如 \d ），运算符和括号。一个例外是 (?flags:...) 包含至少一个标志和正好一个 (?[...]) 构造。这允许对仅包含 (?[...]) 的正则表达式进行插值。如果看到此错误消息，则说明您的字符类中可能还有其他 (?...) 构造。请参见perlrecharclass中的扩展括号字符类。

trans-unit.source: (F) The -M or -m options say that Perl should load some module, but you omitted the name of the module. Consult perlrun for full details about -M and -m.
trans-unit.target: （F） -M 或 -m 选项表示Perl应该加载某些模块，但是省略了该模块的名称。有关 -M 和 -m 的完整详细信息，请咨询perlrun。

trans-unit.source: (F) The -M or -m options say that Perl should load some module, but you omitted the name of the module. Consult perlrun for full details about -M and -m.
trans-unit.target: （F） -M 或 -m 选项表示Perl应该加载某些模块，但是省略了该模块的名称。有关 -M 和 -m 的完整详细信息，请咨询perlrun。

trans-unit.source: (F) The exec function is not implemented on some systems, e.g., Symbian OS. See perlport.
trans-unit.target: （F）在某些系统（例如Symbian OS）上未实现 exec 功能。参见perlport。

trans-unit.source: (F) The open function has been asked to open multiple files. This can happen if you are trying to open a pipe to a command that takes a list of arguments, but have forgotten to specify a piped open mode. See open for details.
trans-unit.target: （F）已要求 open 功能打开多个文件。如果您试图打开一个使用参数列表的命令的管道，但是却忘记了指定管道打开模式，则会发生这种情况。有关详细信息，请参见打开。

trans-unit.source: (F) The errors parameter to the constructor was set to an unknown value.
trans-unit.target: （F）构造函数的 errors 参数设置为未知值。

trans-unit.source: (F) The exec function is not implemented on some systems, e.g., Symbian OS. See perlport.
trans-unit.target: （F）在某些系统（例如Symbian OS）上未实现 exec 功能。参见perlport。

trans-unit.source: (F) The open function has been asked to open multiple files. This can happen if you are trying to open a pipe to a command that takes a list of arguments, but have forgotten to specify a piped open mode. See "open" in perlfunc for details.
trans-unit.target: （F）已要求 open 功能打开多个文件。如果您试图打开一个使用参数列表的命令的管道，但是却忘记了指定管道打开模式，则会发生这种情况。有关详细信息，请参见perlfunc中的“打开”。

trans-unit.source: (F) The ANSI escape sequence passed to uncolor() contains escapes which aren't recognized and can't be translated to names.
trans-unit.target: （F）传递给uncolor（）的ANSI转义序列包含无法识别且无法转换为名称的转义。

trans-unit.source: (F) The CLASSNAME argument to the bless() operator is expected to be the name of the package to bless the resulting object into. You've supplied instead a reference to something: perhaps you wrote
trans-unit.target: （F）bless（）运算符的CLASSNAME参数应该是将结果对象保佑到的程序包名称。相反，您提供了对某事的引用：也许您写了
